features.additionalInfo: Unlimited electronic transactions available on your account
Unlimited free electronic transactions available on your account
Get faster payments between participating banks, anytime with a Pay ID
Backed by the Government Deposit Guarantee for deposits up to $250,000

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be an Australian resident

fees.name: MONTHLY_ACCOUNT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Account fee charged when minimum monthly value is less than $5,000 includes combined balances of savings, term deposits and loans

fees.name: CASH_WITHDRAWAL_AT_SERVICE_CENTRE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when requiring a staff assisted withdrawal from a Service Centre

fees.name: MANUAL_TRANSFER_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you require staff assistance for a transaction from your account

fees.name: OUTWARD_RTGS_PAYMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A Processing fee charged when you require funds to be sent straight away

fees.name: INWARD_RTGS_AND_SWIFT_PAYMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A processing fee charged when you receive funds through this channel

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to cover the cost of producing and sending paper statements

fees.name: INACTIVE_ACCOUNT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged on accounts inactive for 12 months

fees.name: DORMANCY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged if your account remains inactive for 7 years, and we will treat your account as dormant. We have a legal obligation to remit dormant balances exceeding $500 to ASIC as unclaimed money

fees.name: RECALL_OF_FUNDS
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for a request to recall funds

fees.name: QUICKDEBIT_DISHONOUR_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you have insufficient funds in your account and we are unable to honour the transaction for you

fees.name: LATE_PAYMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you don't make your minimum monthly payment, plus any overdue amount

fees.name: TEMPORARY_DAILY_LIMIT_INCREASE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when requiring a temporary higher transaction limit

fees.name: BANK_CHEQUE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when a bank cheque is drawn on your account

fees.name: FOREIGN_CHEQUE_DEPOSIT_(UP_TO_$25K)
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for depositing a foreign cheque up to $25,000

fees.name: FOREIGN_CHEQUE_DEPOSIT_(OVER_$25K)
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for depositing a foreign cheque over $25,000

fees.name: TELEGRAPHIC_TRANSFER_-_SERVICE_CENTRE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for a staff assisted foreign transfer

fees.name: TELEGRAPHIC_TRANSFER_-_ONLINE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for an online foreign transfer

fees.name: TELEGRAPHIC_TRANSFER_-_AUSTRALIAN
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for an online Australian transfer

fees.name: BANK_DRAFT
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for processing a bank draft

depositRates.additionalInfo: All deposits made to the account receive interest on the balance together with a bonus interest, if these conditions are met: no withdrawals or transfers are made in the month, account not closed during the month and minimum $100 deposit each month by cash, cheque, payroll credit or direct credit.

All deposits made to the account receive interest on the balance together with a bonus interest, if these conditions are met: no withdrawals or transfers are made in the month, account not closed during the month and minimum $100 deposit each month by cash, cheque, payroll credit or direct credit.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The interest rate that applies to any overdrawn amounts. This is calculated daily and charged monthly.

data.name: Bonus Saver Account
data.description: Earn bonus interest on your savings if you deposit a minimum of $100 each month, make no withdrawals or transfers in the month, and do not close the account during the month.
